title: 求摧毁地狱歌词，百度查不到
txt_content: 如题，在网上找不到，自己翻译出来的又不太对，看看有谁有歌词（不会很难吧，悬赏就给少点了）

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
rap
Thats it, 这够了
I'm sick of this place,我对这里受够了，
It's hot, 这里很热
It never rains,永远不下雨
I'm sweating， 我在流汗，
My clothes are dirty and filthy and on fire, 我的衣服又脏又臭还在着火，
I'm absoulutely sick of this place，我绝对讨厌这里，
I miss nature, all the pigs and the cows and the sheep'n stuff,我想念大自然，像所有的猪，牛，还有羊
I can't think what i'm gonna do!我不知道我要做什么！
Oh my god,我的天啊
How sad 多么悲剧
i wish i could return to the normal world.我希望我可以回到正常世界。
BYE!

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
第一段
Its deep on the ground,
That is bedrock.它在地底深处，那是地基石。
But don’t dig straight down, 
You will regret that.不要垂直往下挖，你会后悔的。
Now you are brave,
Equip with your spade,现在你变勇敢了，装备你的铁铲，
To roam in this cave.在洞穴里怒吼。
Not looking for gold,不再找金子
But this thing in purple.但是一个紫色的物体
And i have been told,有些人告诉我
By some people,【NOTCH】
I will find a few bricks,我会找到两种方块
With the two of this mixed.用岩浆和水混合
And a couple of clicks.再加上几次点击
I will be swinging my pick.我挥舞着我的稿子
This is all the prep that i go through.这是我所有的准备
Even if my tools are just make do.虽然我的工具只是凑合
I’m movin to the nether x3 我向着地狱前进X3
10 blocks is the magical total, 十个方块是一个魔法的总和
as that’s enough to build my portal.因为那可以早出我的传送门
I’m movin to the nether x3 我向着地狱前进X3

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
第二段
Wth,weathers great here, 怎么搞的，这里的天气真好。
So put up a chair,所以搭起板凳，
Have some cold beer,饮一些冰啤。
You could live by the sea,你可以住在大【yan】海【jiang】旁，
So happy you’ll be,所以你很开心，
With your cobblestone tree.跟你的鹅暖石树一起。
The neighbors are great, 邻居很好，
and nutricious 营养也丰富，
We eat bacon all night, 我们整晚吃培根，
Its delicious.那很美味。
So all of them quibble,他们都哭哭啼啼
For the damage i deal.为我造成的伤害
There’s plenty to steal.那里有很多可以拿
Hack and slice, 挥又砍，
Golden nugget,金粒
I’m rich!我富了！
Who cares if we’re giving up sunlight?谁在意我们放弃阳光？
Glowstone is all we need to keep things bright.我们用萤石照亮
Down you in the nether, 你下来到地狱里
We love it in the nether,我们爱在地狱里
You love it innnnn the nether.你爱在地狱里~~~~~
Don’t expect to see any creepers,不要期望看到任何爬行者
That’s one of my favorites features.那是我最喜欢的特征之一
Down you in the nether, 你下来到地狱里
We love it in the nether,我们爱在地狱里
You love it innnnn the nether.你爱在地狱里~~~~~

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
第三段
Feels like hell the things i just been through, 在地狱好像是刚才的事，
Won't believe a thing that i tell you,不会相信任何我告诉你的事，
You know what i'll screw the nether X3. 你知道吗？我要摧毁地狱X3
Can't believe i lost my new gear too, 不敢相信我丧失了我的新装备，
Think I'd better come and rejoin you. 等我再强一点再来找你，
You know what i'll screw the nether X3. 你知道吗？我要摧毁地狱X3

replies.author: ZENONIA4
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2013-8-14 17:18 
第一段
Its deep on the ground,
That is bedrock.它在地底深处，那是地基石。
赞一个{:10_512:}
